column1: Baby I'm preying on you tonight
column2: 宝贝 今晚我要捕猎你
column3: Hunt you down eat you alive
column11: Maybe you think that you can hide
column12: 也许你以为你可以躲藏
column13: I can smell your scent for miles
column14: 但千里之外我已闻到你的气味
column23: So what you trying to do to me
column24: 所以你能怎么对付我呢
column25: It's like we can't stop we're enemies
column26: 我们是敌人 看样子根本无法停止
column27: But we get along when I'm inside you
column28: 但当我在你体内时我们相处愉快
column29: You're like a drug that's killing me
column33: But I get so high when I'm inside you
column34: 但当我跟你在一起时我如此快乐
column35: Yeah you can start over you can run free
column36: 耶 你可以重头来过 你可以自由离开
column37: You can find other fish in the sea
column38: 你可以找寻海洋里的其他鱼
column39: You can pretend it's meant to be
column41: But you can't stay away from me
column43: I can still hear you making that sound
